item.title: James add a quote by Andrew Carnegie
item.description: "It marks a big step in your development when you come to realize that other people can help you do a better job than you could do alone." -- Andrew Carnegie

item.title: James add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "Our life is what our thoughts make it." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: James add a quote by Frank Herbert
item.description: "There should be a science of discontent. People need hard times to develop psychic muscles. -- Muad'Dib" -- Frank Herbert

item.title: James add a quote by Norman Vincent Peale
item.description: "Change your thoughts and you change your world." -- Norman Vincent Peale

item.title: James add a quote by Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.
item.description: "I find the great thing in this world is not so much where we stand, as in what direction we are moving - we must sail sometimes with the wind and sometimes against it - but we must sail, and not drift, nor lie at anchor." -- Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.

item.title: James add a quote by George Lucas
item.description: "Always remember, your focus determines your reality." -- George Lucas

item.title: James add a quote by Stephen R. Donaldson
item.description: "He who waits for the sword to fall upon his neck will surely lose his head." -- Stephen R. Donaldson

item.title: James add a quote by Joseph Swetnam
item.description:
"Be not wise in thine own conceit, in thinking that thou hast learned all the skill which is to be learned already, farre deceived are thou if thou thinks so, for if thou live (til) thou art olde, yet thou mayest learne still.
Never leave studying and practicing till you come to the ground and until you have sounded into the depth of your Art." -- Joseph Swetnam

item.title: James add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "It is not enough that we do our best; sometimes we must do what is required." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: James add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: James add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "You know, Hobbes, some days even my lucky rocket ship underpants don't help." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: James add a quote by John Naisbitt
item.description: "We are drowning in information but starved for knowledge." -- John Naisbitt
